name: Sundown (r0ckems0ckem)
description:
You're a lawman who's been bitten and become a vampire. The sun melts your skin and blood is the only things that can heal the wounds. Survive until sundown by killing enemies with your fists or your trusty, revolver and then drain their blood. Try to survive until the night, then you will finally be safe... right?

Recommended to download and use an XBox controller

Controls:

XBox Controller:

Run: L-Stick

Jump: A/Y

Punch: X/B

Gun: RT

Drain Blood: LT

Dash: RB/LB in direction of L-Stick

Mouse and Keyboard:

Run: WASD

Jump: Space

Punch: Left Click

Gun: E

Drain Blood: Q

Dash: Right Click in direction of cursor
